Pinaki S. Bhadury

Full CV: Here

About Me

Hi, my name is Pinaki and I am an organic chemist with over 20 years of teaching and research experience in both academia (as a university professor) and industry (as a leading scientist) with more than 100 publications and over 2400 citations in highly reputed international journals.

I am currently teaching Chemistry at Royal Imperial Collegiate of Canada and am an editorial board member of Current Organic Chemistry, Bentham Science Publishers.

I am a resident of Niagara Falls, Ontario, Canada. My expertise is primarily in teaching, research and editorial.

Awards and Publications

Friendship Award 2009

The biggest national award for foreign experts conferred by the government of P.R. China.

Editorial Board Member of Current Organic Chemistry

I am part of the editorial board team at Bentham Science Publishers.

Published Book

Co-authored Environment-Friendly Antirviral Agents for Plants, Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg, 2010.

Experience

Chemistry Teacher

Teaching all branches of Chemistry to Chemistry students at RICC, St. Catherines, Canada.

Editorial Board Member and Bentham Ambassador

Aug 2016 - Present

Bentham Science Publishers

Entrusted with the job of promoting publications in Bentham Science Journals as an editorial board member and a Brand Bentham ambassador from Canada.

Research Scienctist and R&D Manager

2014 - 2015

NorthernChem Inc.

Worked as Research and Development manager/scientist to develop newer methodologies for anti-cancer drugs-supervised co-op students from Canadian Universities

Professor and Foreign Expert

2013

Shanghai University of Engineering Science

Held full professorship, supervised and taught under-graduate and post-graduate students in medicinal and organic chemistry.

Professor and Foreign Expert

2006 - 2012

Guizhou University

Held full professorship, researched organic chemistry at the highest level. Taught Advanced Organic Chemistry and General Chemistry to Master and Doctoral students of the university. Supervised master and doctorate students for their dissertations in medicinal, organic and pesticidal chemistry. Also awarded “Friendship Award, 2009”, the biggest national award for Foreign experts for outstanding research, conferred by the Govt. of China.

Research Associate

2004 - 2005

Dartmouth College

Government Scientist Grade A (Gazetted Officer)

1991 - 2004

Govt. of India, Defence Research & Development Organization, Ministry of Defence
